pages.headline: 9' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 1, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Goal! Celtic 1, Kilmarnock 0. Johnny Kenny (Celtic) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Reo Hatate.

pages.headline: 50' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 2, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Goal! Celtic 2, Kilmarnock 0. Kieran Tierney (Celtic) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Liam Scales.

pages.headline: 84' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 3, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Goal! Celtic 3, Kilmarnock 0. Daizen Maeda (Celtic) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Arne Engels with a through ball.

pages.headline: 86' CHANCE! -- Attempt saved
pages.caption: Attempt saved. Daizen Maeda (Celtic) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal by Eddie Beach (Kilmarnock). Assisted by Anthony Ralston with a through ball.

pages.headline: 91' PENALTY MISSED! -- Penalty conceded by James Brown (Kilmarnock) after a foul in the penalty area
pages.caption: Penalty conceded by James Brown (Kilmarnock) after a foul in the penalty area.

pages.headline: 91' PENALTY! -- Penalty Celtic
pages.caption: Penalty Celtic. Yang Hyun-Jun draws a foul in the penalty area.

pages.headline: 92' GOAL! -- Goal! Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0
pages.caption: Goal! Celtic 4, Kilmarnock 0. Arne Engels (Celtic) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
